UPLOAD_TITLE: Add images, video, audio and modeling
UPLOAD_EXPLAIN: JPG, PNG, GIF, SVG, MP4, WEBM, MP3, WAV, OGG etc. (Up to 40mb)
CATEGORY_EXPLAIN: You can easily search by selecting a category.
NAME: Name
NAME_HOLDER: Example: A collection of atmospheric night view photos
ITEM_DESC_HOLDER: Example: I took a picture of the night sky centered on the constellations and a night view of the city.
ITEM_DESC_EXPLAIN: Please enter a description that best describes the characteristics of the item.
COPIES: Number of copies to be issued
COPIES_EXPLAIN: The number of copies that can be issued. If you set multiple, one item will be sold to multiple customers.
